```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(huxtable)
library(gtsummary)
library(labelled)

data(penguins)

penguins <- penguins %>%
  bstfun::use_varnames_as_labels()

```

# Regular Table

```{r}
df <- penguins %>% head(n =10)

df %>% gt()


```



# {gtsummary} Examples

## Default

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels()
```

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels() %>%
  as_gt()
```

# With Compact Theme

```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact()

penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels() %>%
  as_gt()

reset_gtsummary_theme()
```

# Add Header

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels()  %>%
  as_gt() %>%
  tab_header("Title")

```

# Highlight Specific Values

```{r}
x <- penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels()  %>%
  as_gt() %>%
  tab_header("Title")
```


```{r}
x$`_data` <- x$`_data` %>%
  mutate(new_cond = parse_number(stat_0)) 

x %>%
      gt::tab_style(
        style = list(
          cell_fill(color = "purple")
          ),
        locations = cells_body(
          columns = stat_0,
          rows =  new_cond >= 100 
        )
      )


```


```{r, eval = FALSE}
x %>%
  mutate(new_cond = parse_number(stat_0)) %>%
  set_text_color(row = .$new_cond >= 100, 2,  "purple") %>%
  select(-new_cond)
```
